about.title: About TripNARA

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: AI is flooding the world with more content, more routes, more noise. But the real world hasn't changed ‚Äî weather, terrain, risk, fatigue still matter.
mission.p2: No one is building systems that understand and respect physical reality. TripNARA is that system.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: Help humans move through the world with intelligence, respect, and responsibility.

taglines: We judge routes like lives depend on them.
AI that knows when to say no.
Routes are not content. They are responsibility.

whatIs.title: What is Route Intelligence?
whatIs.p1: Route Intelligence is a new category we're creating. It's not about recommending more places or optimizing for engagement. It's about understanding whether a route should exist at all.
whatIs.p2: We don't compete with OTA platforms or LLM assistants. We create a new standard for how routes are judged and validated.

routeDirection.title: RouteDirection
routeDirection.description: Understanding how the land wants to be walked, not just listing places.

dem.title: DEM Evidence
dem.description: Terrain-level validation that proves routes are physically possible and safe.

personas.title: Three-Persona System
personas.description: Safety, rationality, and spatial intelligence working together to make responsible decisions.

login.title: Login to TripNARA
login.googleDescription:
Sign in with Google to automatically save your route decision records
No password required, sync your routes across devices
login.fallbackNote: Email OTP / Magic Link will be available as an alternative login method in the future
